channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 00:44 Air alert in Odesa region. Follow for further updates.
item.description: 游댮 00:44 Air alert in Odesa region. Follow for further updates. #Odessa_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 00:03 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community- Pokrovska territorial community- Chervonohryhorivska territorial community

item.title: 游댮 21:29 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover!
item.description: 游댮 21:29 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover! #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
